com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog.controllers

Class SearchableSelectionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog.FormElementController
      • com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog.controllers.LabeledFieldController
        • com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog.controllers.SearchableSelectionController

  • public class SearchableSelectionController
extends LabeledFieldController
    Represents a field that allows a user to select from a list of items, with the ability to search for specific items. It also allows for free-form entry if the input text does not exist in the predefined list. This field is useful when the number of items are large. While the list of items are retrieved in the background from the data source, a loading indicator is displayed. For similar functionality, but with a small number of items, use SelectionController instead.

    For the field value, the associated FormModel must return a String representing the currently selected item. If the value does not exist in the list, 'Other (x)' will be displayed, where 'x' is the field value. No selection can be represented by returning null for the value of the field.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SearchableSelectionController.SelectionDataSource
      An interface that provides the list of items to display for the SearchableSelectionController.

      • SearchableSelectionController

        public SearchableSelectionController(android.content.Context ctx,
                             java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String labelText,
                             boolean isRequired,
                             java.lang.String placeholder,
                             SearchableSelectionController.SelectionDataSource dataSource)
        Creates a new instance of a selection field.
        Parameters:
        ctx - the Android context
        name - the name of the field
        labelText - the label to display beside the field. Set to null to not show a label.
        isRequired - indicates if the field is required or not
        placeholder - a placeholder text to show when the input field is empty
        dataSource - the data source that provides the list of items to display
